content.detailedDescription: I was walking out to my car and as i was walking down the stairs on the second floor, i looked over and saw these two bright lights. i see a lot of airplanes being in my location and these lights seemed too bright to be an airplane. i finished going to my car and when i came back up the stairs to look at the objects, they were gone. there was no sounds and they were gone within a couple of minutes.
content.summary: Two bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling north on hwy 3 between scottsberg and north vernon around 10 pm. it looked to move in a "slinky" motion.  4-5 orbs extending to be seen separately than coming together as one.  we watched for 5-6 mins then it disappeared. 

 may have been helicopters from the muscatatuck urban training center doing night flights.  but there wasn't any sound and the way the lights moved and disappeared was different than i had seen from other times the helicopters where in the area.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4-5 orbs moving in a "slinky" motion. separated than joined. then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was leaving my grandmas house , to go to my house (which is only about 20ft away from my house) i looked up at the stars and i notice this light. as i watched it i noticed it went left and right. then i saw it go backwards now i know planes don't go backwards. so i kept watching this light flying thing. and every (and i'm assuming ) 10 miles it repeated this act. and liked i said it went backwards as well as left to right. i lost track of it when a passing car on my road distracted me from it and it sped away super and i mean super fast all most like a bullet but faster and without the noise. now today 8-14-15 i feel this lump dryness in my throat and i'm coughing real bad. 


thank you for your time mufon
content.summary: It moved fast and then stopped and when it stopped it went backwards and then zigged zagged going the org way

content.detailedDescription: Spouse and self sitting on deck with miles of view from mountain location. we do this a lot and we are familiar with the view and evening sky.  spouse commented, "look! what is that?" i followed his gaze and saw among the very sparse non-cumulous clouds a double line of very bright and very large yellow-metallic-white lights.  not blinking and not moving.  the sun was down, but stars had not yet appeared, and these lights were approximately 2x or 3x larger and brighter than any stars, anyway.  i could not turn my head away because i have never seen anything like this and was completely mystified.  then after only a few seconds, they just disappeared.  without moving, but seemingly "behind" the small thin cloud that was above them.  we actually expected that the lights would become visible again as the cloud moved or disipated, but they were just gone.  we were pretty freaked out, and a few minutes later we heard a rumbling like thunder seeming to come from south of the lights' location, but there were no storms or storm clouds nearby.  as we continued to stare at the sky looking for something that would help us understand what we saw, my spouse said he thought the sky looked like there was a line in it.  i didn't understand, but then a jet appeared with a trail behind it, but there was no line in the sky from the area it came from.  it was like it just came into view in the middle of the sky, from "nowhere".  there is commercial and other air traffic visible from our lookout, but this jet was moving much faster than a regular commercial plane - feels wierd to suggest this, but it seems like it was a miliary plane following-up on the out of normal event.
content.summary: About a dozen lights 2x6 appeared from behind small cloud. too big and bright to be stars, not moving from pattern, then disappeared quickly - too big and bright to have not gone somewhere

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in a place where i had other encounters is a touristic area---small --airplanes pass through there often-due there is a small airport near by-and small jet planes fly in and out through that area-

at first i see what seems to be two small airplanes flying next two each other--and due that the area is windy--and dangerous due to wind currents-i found this unusual--

then without warning one of the airplanes made an impossible turn or change of direction from straight line to a sharp left--impossible for an airplane--that's when i realized i was not looking at an airplane

the other airplane kept going into the normal route

-the ufo-this one faded into the night
content.summary: At first seem like a small airplane--like a small cabin airplane--but the way it turned was obvious it wasn't an airplane

content.detailedDescription: Seen from marian shrine in stockbridge, ma looking towards west stockbridge, ma. upside down teardrop dropping great speed, moving straight down to earth, extremely fast, under half a hand of saturn. glaring pure bright white, brighter than any terrestrial aircraft, a blaze of white, brighter than a full moon in telescope eyepiece, had width of 1 finger, not small, not a meteor as it moved straight down towards earth 1 inch lower from planet.
content.summary: White beam travels straight down, glowing! western ma

content.detailedDescription: I am a taxi driver & had just got home from a job,as there was a meteor  shower  predicted i was  keeping  an eye on the  skies. as i approached my house i noticed an orange orb low in the sky, when i got out of the car i wanted to have a better look, thinking it was mars, but then i realised it was moving but i couldn't hear anything. i've seen  thousands of aircraft over the  years & knew it wasn't any of the normal aircraft that fly over my house because it was only one light,normal aircraft have several lights and they flash. i then heard an engine & was about to  go into the house when i realised that, yes i could  hear  a plane  but  that was  behind me & then i saw the  lights  of the plane,the plane & the orb passed each other about 1 mile apart going in opposite directions. i then let myself into the house & went out to the back garden & continued watching as it flew quite slowly across still not  far above the horizon & then suddenly it was gone. i was never sure if i believed in ufo's before, but this wasn't anything i've ever seen before. my house is situated between 2 airports, plus a couple of airfields for light aircraft & gliders & there are a couple of military airbase in the area so i really  have seen most aircraft  (including concorde)
content.summary: Glowing orange  orb that moved  silently just  above the  horizon then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I am filing this report for my father who will be 90 years old in october 2015. my father served in the united states navy in ww2 and was deployed on the uss anchor ars13 in 1946 as quarter master third class. my father filled out and file a complete and specific report in the ships log about this incident. here is my fathers recollection as if he were speaking...

approximately the end of may or first part of june 1946, i was on watch on the uss anchor ars13 from 16:00 to 24:00. we were in route from guam to pearl harbor hawaii. approximately half way through my watch i saw a bluish/greenish streak traveling at a tremendous speed on the port side above the horizon. the streak was about 30 degrees above the horizon, traveling from north east to north west. the streak had no arch, it was straight as an arrow. at first i thought it was a ship in distress, but i ruled that out because flares are red and they have an arch and the same as for meteorites, they have an arch also. this streak was parallel to the horizon and no arch. i immediately reported it to the captain. the captain came right away with the first lieutenant. when the captain arrived he ordered to check the radar. the radar showed a blip circling the ship about a mile out and it would circle the ship about every 10 seconds. we were all astonished at the speed this thing was going. the captain then ordered a sailor to go onto the mast to check the radar to see if a bird or something else was obstructing the radar. all was clear. after this had been going on for about 10 minutes, all of the sudden the blip changed direction and just streaked off the screen. my whole report was filed in the ships log on the uss anchor ars13, approximately may or june of 1946. total witnesses that were there... myself, captain, first lieutenant, executive officer, engineering officer, radio man and radar man. no recurrence of this incident.

my father said back in 1946, nobody would ever think of this being a ufo sighting, since there was no ufo sighting back in those days. the first ufo publicly reported was june 24, 1947 by kenneth arnold a private pilot.
content.summary: Uss anchor logs ufo in 1946

content.detailedDescription: I set up my video camera in the bedroom windows. i then left and i did not. check the video camera for months.
content.summary: I cought it all on video out of bedroom windows

content.detailedDescription:
One night looking towards a military base near that area i noticed a several red lights one at a time lifting straight up in air then shooting across sky at extreme rate of speed. 
couple nights later notices what appeared to be a bright star in sky untill it dawned on me it was below atmosphere and jumping around at great speed and unlike anything man made i'm aware of. when i took pictures on my cell phone (which was stolen with sd card with pics on it) every pic i took the object had reptile like faces and kept changing shift on every pic and i took like 15 in a 45 second period. 

then very next morning in broad daylight i noticed several round craft lifting from military base but were cloaked. not invisible but yet invisible. like it was cloaked. i could see straight through them but still see them similar to when the hellicarrier in the avengers movie cloaked itself. they were flying around the city and at times flew directly over my house no more than 50 feet above me. what's even stranger is at one point almost as if they noticed me noticing them one of the crafts changed shape while still cloaked into a skull and shot towards me opening mouth like it was gonna swallow me up. scared to death i ran inside and for two weeks did not leave my home. was scared to sharestory for fear of being made out to be crazy. but i welcome a lie detector test to prove i saw what i say i saw.
content.summary: I had several sightings day and night of different shaped craft and different lighting. craft also changed shape

content.detailedDescription: While star gazing i noticed a satellite and told my brother to check it out. he was looking through my binoculars and after a minute i asked if he seen the satellite. he asked me what is that flashing. i asked where and grabbed the binoculars. and i couldn't believe what i was seeing. i stargaze every chance i get and have never seen anything like this. it was a triangle formation of lights hovering about 30 degrees above the horizon, and flashing and pulsating white and blue. and then it made a circle movement that covered a large area. then it moved in a straight line, then dropped and came back to where it was when we first seen it. my daughter asked where it was and i pointed a green laser that was made for a rifle at it, and the lights vanished. my brother witnessed this as well. i have looked for it every night since and have seen nothing out of the ordinary.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A triangle formation of lights pulsating,and moving in large circle and path

content.detailedDescription: I was watching fireworks in my backyard, when i noticed 2 rectangular objects north of my location, i'm retired from the aviation side of the navy, so i know what a aircraft and a helicopter look like, and these 2 objects were not either of these. they were just hovering above the mountains, they were not moving and had lights on the bottom of the objects.  the first object after about 5 minutes started slowly descended down and out of site, the second object just stayed airborne for another 15 minute, before moving downward and out of site. i was excited to see these objects and i was not scared.
content.summary: After watching fireworks i noticed  rectangular objects just hovering in the sky north of where i live

content.detailedDescription: I have been abducted since youth. i served as a marine corps infantryman and served two tours where sightings continued. i am still i. contact to this day. i need to have my story told
content.summary: I have been abducted since youth

content.detailedDescription:
Small object recorded in military grade gen 2 night vision comes into view, makes somewhat of a u-turn around a slower moving satellite or jet and speeds away in the north east direction. 
original raw video available.
content.summary: Star-like object flight-path irratic recorded night vision

content.detailedDescription: Let dog out and stood on driveway stairs to wait for her to finish her business. something made me look up and i saw a thumbnail sized, oval light travel at extremely high speed across the sky. no sound. it was faster than any plane i've ever seen. i've seen a falling star once before and it was not a falling star. it was also much lower than i've seen any plane fly. i had no feeling of any kind. i lost sigh as it traveled south
content.summary: Observed from driveway. thumbnail sized object very low in sky. moving at extremely fast speed.

content.detailedDescription: While outside smoking with 2 others a bright light was observed from the middle of the big dipper.  it lasted for 1 second.  flashed on, then disappeared.  5 minutes later, the object was observed north east of us, over liberty, missouri.  i observed it for about a hour before going to bed.  this object changed colors in a sequential pattern.  it hoveredmotionless.  i noted star movement in relation to it due to the earth's rotation, but it remained stationary.  it was approximately 45 degrees off the horizon.  i noted also, 3 shooting stars in the sky, none in that area.  i tried to capture video with my phone, but could not find it in my lens/on my screen.  i could only capture some still photos.  the distance is over 5 miles away.
content.summary: Witnessed while outside smoking with 2 others.  i watched for a hr before going to bed.

content.detailedDescription: My dogs woke me up early in the morning so i thought they had to go out to use the bath room. i took them out side to do their business. we live out in the country in a small neighborhood so everything was quiet and normal. i looked up like i always do to check out the stars and noticed a really bright star that was normally not there. i knew it was not an aircraft because at first it was stationary. it within a couple of minutes staring at it , the object started moving very quickly the took a 90 degree turn then another in a zigzag motion. we live in between fort bragg and jacksonvill, the military bases as well we are on the flight paths of rdu. we see a lot of military and commercial aircraft. this behaved like something i have seen before. the object shot straight up and out of sight. i have never seen a plane do that. i assumed it may be some type of military experimental aircraft but several nights later my son came in and woke me up, scared to death. he had witnessed the same thing and wanted me to come check it out. the wierd thing was i did not tell anyone about what i had witnessed and he described it the same way i had. he is 24 and a computer geek and not one for making stuff up. he will no longer take the dogs out late at night.
content.summary: Object changed direction sharply in a zig zag up and down then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: One week straight my 2 yr old is not sleeping through the night.  he points with fear in eyes at things i do not see.  extra clingy, won't sleep alone.  last night i felt fear, walked around house out of body.   woke up and saw unexplainable shadow.  my boy was having a nightmare, crying and kicking.  i am concerned it has something to do with drunvalo melchizedek or a spirit was already here when we moved into this new house a few weeks ago.   my little boy points at window sometimes where shadow possibly came from.
content.summary: Had out of body experience.  woke up and saw shadow move across wall.  could have been outside window, not sure

content.detailedDescription: I was in a meeting at work and out of the corner of my eye i saw a black mass out the window. i turned and looked out the window and i saw a safer shaped, gray dull craft hovering above the court house directly across the street from where i work. there are power lines in front of where i work and it was hard to tell if it was hovering above the court house or the power lines. it then flew off north east at an upward angle faster than any man made thing i have ever seen. i was stunned. i didn't know what to do. non of my co-workers seemed shocked so i assumed that i was the only one who noticed it. i didn't say anything write away to prevent myself from looking like a fool in a professional situation. had some of my co-workers seen the craft i would have definitely talked about it sooner. but i know what i saw.
content.summary: I saw a ufo for 3 seconds then it flew away very fast. faster than any man made object i had ever seen.

content.detailedDescription: On february 3rd 1973 i was flying with a pilot and co pilot on a military uh-1 helicopter returning from montgomery, alabama to fort rucker, alabama. the time was approximately 6:00 pm. the pilot radioed the tower to let them know we were entering the airport airspace. the tower could not locate us so they asked us to turn on our landing lights. the tower then acknowledge seeing us and gave us the wind and barometric pressure. the ski was clear and there were few clouds visible. shortly there after a mist started to appear directly in front of our helicopter that thickened really quickly. to the point i thought we were in a thick fog. then i could make out what looked like a red flashing light (with no defined edges) directly in front of us. the effect reminded me of a car's tail light(one side only) with the flasher on that is located in a thick fog. you do not see the car- just the light).Almost instantly the red light become brighter and suddenly you could see a cylinder object pulsating red ever its surface coming directly at our windshield. the pilot immediately dove to the left and down thinking we where going to hit. my impression was that this red lighted cylinder object had flown directly through us as if we where not even there. the total time from the appearance of the fog or mist to the red object coming directly at us was approximately 10 to 20 seconds ( its hard to gage time when the event is occurring.) the pilot and copilot then said over the intercom to each other what the heck was that. all three of us had seen the object. the pilot called the tower and asked if we had any traffic in our area and they said that there was no traffic. the pilot and copilot both said that this was something that they had no idea what it was and they thought they where colliding with an unknown flying object (ufo). if it was the top of a radio tower, i saw no tower, no support wires etc. the object made no attempt to avoid our helicopter. the reason i am reporting this now is i am getting up there in years and want to let others know my experience.
content.summary: Red light coming directly at our helicopter- evasive dive taken

content.detailedDescription:
I was cycling up valmont road in boulder colorado at approximately 9.45pm on 8.12, it was dark with some clouds high in the sky but good visibility. there was a storm to the south-west, maybe 10 miles away and i noticed one lightning flash in my peripheral vision.

i was waiting for the red lights to change (at the intersection of valmont & us 36), so i could cross over valmont and safely get onto the sidewalk of us 36. looking straight ahead and slightly up toward the traffic lights i suddenly saw an orange globe move very fast in a diagonal direction, from right to left, towards the ground and go behind the gas station and trees. i would estimate i saw it travel 20 yards before it disappeared out of site into the tress. 

it was a circular shape, maybe a sphere but it was hard to understand if it was flat or a true ball. i would estimate that it was the size of soccer ball, possibly a little smaller.
content.summary: Looked like ball lightning.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving the hospital after visiting my father as i approached my car i looked up towards the south i saw 3 red lights that seemed to be moving very slowly the distance was difficult to guess but i would say 2/3 miles which would have put it over yearby/new marske woods it was massive the lights seemed to disappear very slowly, it was like watching it in slow motion but it seemed like a few seconds .It seemed to be of triangular shape the light in the centre was closer to me..I think what i saw was not of this earth and may have been a spacecraft. i've only just decided to report this after seeing hanger 1 on sky. i would love to know if anyone one else saw this.
content.summary: 3 red lights

content.detailedDescription: Outside looking at rainbow around the sun we took pictures with 2 different cell phones. we didn't see the object until we saw the pictures. we went outside and check if we saw anything again.... can't see anything anymore! ufo!! with out the cell phone you can't see it it's too bright the object and rainbow are now gone!
content.summary: We didn't see it until we looked at the pics we took we have several there was a rainbow around the sun

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We saw two bright orbs in the sky adjacent to each other while we were driving down 1604 going east about 10pm. they caught our attention, because they were bright in the sky.  when we got into my neighborhood, i got out to track it with my star tracker app thinking they were planets or something, because i didn't know what it was. it went from being still to moving sideways away from each other and i jumped in my car and drove home down the road.  when we got out of the car, it flew right over us.  it was humming and turning off it's lights that were under it.  they were green, blue and yellow and the surface was metal.  it disappeared into the sky and my sister and i were freaked out.  we tried to justify what we saw calling it a possible drone, but we don't think so.  surreal. we still have a hard time believing it, but we know what we saw. just too nervous to capture with our camera phones.
content.summary: What started as two bright orbs in the sky northeast of san antonio ended up flying over us at my house north san antonio.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a school hanging out with two friends when we saw a light we weren't sure if it was a helicopter or not until it came closer.  it had 3 big lights on the bottom and a bunch of tiny lights around it. the ufo followed us as we tried to run away in fear. it would hover in one area then turn towards us and come in our direction again. it did this for about 15 minutes until we sprinted down the road and it lost sight of us. then it turned its lights off and stayed stationary about 800 ft from us. we called for a ride and started walking to the main road. we noticed it turning its lights back on and coming towards us again. we decided to run instead of walk. we lost sight of the object when we set down on a curb with a lot of people around to ensure if anything happened we would have witnesses or protection.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Terrifying, it followed us from the school yard we were at and hovered over us and followed us down the road

content.detailedDescription: Monday night at about 9:55pm (10/08/2015), i went outside on my porch to smoke a cigarette and look at the sky and then i saw a very bright lime green  ball emerge from the field across the road from my place at about an average of 75 feet from me...And a big flash occured and then it started to move ; i could see like  pulsating white and green lights while it was hovering in the field beside the ditch near the road and then it stopped again right in front of my house in the field at about 40 feet away from my porch and another very bright flash occured. i was so excited that i ran inside the house to go get my spouse so he could see this, but when we went back outside it was gone. i told my spouse: we will see the state of the field in the morning and we saw circles and many patches where the barley was laid down in many places in the field and i'm not sure, but in some places it seemed burned. i took pictures of all these traces.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very luminous green ball emerging from field then flashed then moved right in front of my house at about 40 feet away  there was some sort of white pulsating lights when it stopped in front on m house it flashed again very bright

content.detailedDescription:
Das objekt bewekte sich von meinem standort aus nach links / westen

wargenommen wurde es die ersten sekunden als "beweglicher stern"


weitereführende information:

gefilmt mit:
zavarius nachtsicht-gerät

modell nightvision 
nx-4141-675
videoformat: h.264

auflösung: 640 x 480

ton/mikrofon: nicht verbaut

objektiv-durchmesser: 20mm

sichtwinkel: 7 grad

f# der objektlinse: tag 5.1 , nacht 1.3

infrarotstufe des videos: 0 (und später) 1
0 % und 14,3%

datenträger:
sandisk 4 gb micro-sd
content.summary: White and silent

content.detailedDescription:
Ground zero media july 7th 2015.
the phantom of phobos w/ chase kloetzke. who is also a mufon fi.

at 3:02:30 in to the program
c (clyde)... jeff in utah.
j (jeff)hey clyde i saw the triangular craft on friday 3rd of july.
c-you did? where did you see it?
j-in pleasant grove utah. it was over me. i was watching it and kind of keeping my eyes on the sky because of the increased military aircraft lately. and i'm watching it wondering if it was a helicopter or airplane and it went straight over head and i saw its triangular and it's got lights on every edge. and what surprised me because i've heard a lot about these is that i've always assumed that the point of the triangle pointed forwards. there was a flat edge pointed forward as it moved over me. and it had lights all along every edge. it was only about 500 feet high probably only 15 to 20 feet long on each one of the edges and on the tail it had a very bright light brighter than all the rest of them and the rest of them seemed like soft colored leds.
c-interesting. probably so far i bet you didn't hear anything. so it flew the flat edge first?
j-flat edge forward and pointed towards the back.
c-i never seen that i've seen flying square that was amazing and it looked like it had four lights on in one square shaped and it was fun kind of bizarre. saw it in utah the wasatch mountains near the university of utah.
j-they say the new area 51 is out near dugway.
c-it is. the eagle range they have a huge runway 2 to 3 miles long no one knows why they have a runway that long. maybe they have something that needs a runway that much space to land but there are other things that they are testing like lasers. they are using to communicate with extraterrestrials. i've been out in that area in fact. i was there held at gunpoint when i stood in front of the gate. soldier showed up they were very nice to me and then said you better get out us here because if wackenhut shows up you're going to be a dead man. i better not be a dead man so i put all my stuff away because we had a camera. some guy from wackenhut saying if i don't leave the property i'm going to be shot. so they escorted me from tula county to salt lake county and then left me.
j-i heard that they have restricted access enclosed a lot of the roads that used to travel on down there.
c-they warned me not to be in that county again and i go to wendover. so i said yeah whatever but when they were very mean to me.Military was kind of in blazers pulled guns on us and followed us out of the county. during the day. had flashlights and everything my crew left the camera running but we knew wackenhut meant business. drones?.....Missing conversation
j-but this triangle craft was so small. i heard them being the size of football fields 1520 feet long but it made me think that it's a drone because it's small and that makes it look less threatening. then i thought why haven't we seen a full size quadcopter like for an aerial crane. 
end at 3:08:50
content.summary: Triangle went right overhead moving with the forward. collected from ground zero media with clyde lewis

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i drove up to mineral point to watch the recent meteor shower. around 12 am the morning of the 13th, we got out of our car to look at the sky. we saw what looked like a star moving across a portion of the sky. at first we thought it was a plane, but it had no blinking lights. it went straight then abruptly changed direction in mid air, this caught us by surprise. it literally did 90 degree changes. then  the light started fading until we couldn't see it anymore. maybe it's nothing but i wanted to share
content.summary: Star light object solid star like color, abrupt directions changes, faded away

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking into my bedroom (looking north)(8/13/2015, 10:50pm cdt).  i saw an extremely bright white light outside my very large bedroom window.  i went to the window and saw the extremely bright white light illuminating my entire lawn, fence, and trees at the back of the house (large area).  the white light was so intense, i could make out every blade of grass.  it was brighter than daylight and it covered the whole backyard.   the white light was steady (very little movement) illuminating my grass for about 5 minutes.  i wanted to see where the bright white light was coming from, so i looked up and i saw a bright red steady light (also very little movement, inches).  it looked like there was some movement back and forth, but on the order of inches, very slight movement, which i could gauge by the shadow of my house on the grass moving slightly.  when i looked in the direction of the red light, i could not see the source of the white light projecting onto my lawn - there was absolutely no beam at all.  i noticed that the bright white light was only my grass, fence, and trees, but the sky was dark.  there was no sound at all during my observation.  during my observation, i could not make out any object around the red light - it was so dark.  the red light was very bright and the color was beautiful.  it was not a paprika red, but had a combination of red and purple, a stead color.

when i first saw the white light projected onto my grass, i thought there must be a police helicopter with a bright search light trying to find somebody in my yard.  

my feeling was of fear because i thought someone was on the loose in my yard, and the police were searching for them.   i left the room to go get my husband to come see the scene.   the bright white light and red hovering light were gone when i got back to my bedroom (2 minutes later).  after the incident, i went to all my windows to see if i could find someone lurking (there was nobody).


after the incident, it occurred to me that the bright white light was not performing as a search light, moving back and forth, it was steady the whole time over a fixed area.  it also occurred to me that it was strange there was no sound at all, and that a helicopter or other air vehicle would have made sound especially being so low to the ground.

other:  weather was clear skies and very dark, no moon.

i would like someone to come to my house to see if there is anything left behind on my grass or trees from this very bright white light.
content.summary: Extremely bright white steady light illuminating my lawn - i could see blade of grass.  hovering object with extr, bright red steady light. no sound at all
